title: Can you please help me ID this font? Grunge/eroded
content:
Hey.  
Can you help me? I've searched literally everything, common sites online with image search, Google-image search, to no avail - only samples of usage. Can you help me?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/typophile.com/files/a_53.jpg) | 49.94 KB |
| [d.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/typophile.com/files/d_4.jpg) | 47.37 KB |
| [air-connect-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/typophile.com/files/air-connect-logo.jpg) | 110.05 KB |
| [Untitled-5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-5_1.jpg) | 147.08 KB |
author: venthe

comments.content: You should post on the new Type ID board: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Anyway, this is Boycott, by Flat-it: [http://www.dafont.com/it/boycott.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/www.dafont.com/it/boycott.font "http://www.dafont.com/it/boycott.font")  
Subsequently refined: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/boycott/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/boycott/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/boycott/")

The non distressed original looks like it could have been Engschrift.
